title: Update Add Funds page with UPI ID and PhonePe QR code

requirements.text: Update the Add Funds page (`frontend/src/pages/AddFunds.tsx`) to display the UPI ID '8825245372-l3c6@ibl' prominently in the 'Scan & Pay' section. Show it as a copyable text field or highlighted label with a 'Copy UPI ID' button, instructing users to pay to this UPI ID via any UPI app (PhonePe, Google Pay, Paytm, etc.).

quotes: Use this UPI ID for the 'Add Funds' section: 8825245372-l3c6@ibl

acceptanceCriteria: UPI ID '8825245372-l3c6@ibl' is displayed visibly in the Add Funds page Scan & Pay section
A 'Copy UPI ID' button or similar affordance allows users to copy the UPI ID to clipboard
Instructional text tells users to pay using any UPI app to this UPI ID
The UPI ID display is styled consistently with the existing dark navy/orange-red BharatSMM theme

requirements.text: Replace the existing QR code image on the Add Funds page (`frontend/src/pages/AddFunds.tsx`) with the newly generated PhonePe QR code image (`frontend/public/assets/generated/bharatsmm-phonepe-qr.dim_400x600.png`). Display it in the 'Scan & Pay' section above the UPI ID, with a label 'Scan with PhonePe or any UPI app' and the account holder name 'Mr Sandeep Kumar' shown below the QR code.

quotes: Also, let me know where I can upload my QR Code image so users can scan and pay easily

acceptanceCriteria: The PhonePe QR code image is displayed prominently in the Scan & Pay section of the Add Funds page
The label 'Scan with PhonePe or any UPI app' appears above or alongside the QR code
Account holder name 'Mr Sandeep Kumar' is shown beneath the QR code
The existing old QR code image reference is replaced with the new one
QR code section is styled consistently with the BharatSMM dark navy/orange-red theme

constraints: UPI ID must be displayed exactly as provided: 8825245372-l3c6@ibl
Do not modify any files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
The new QR code image must be served as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated — do not route it through the backend
nonGoals: Do not add any real-time payment verification or UPI payment gateway integration
Do not change the top-up request submission logic or backend validation
Do not modify the minimum deposit amount (already set to ₹1)
Do not change any other pages besides AddFunds.tsx

edits: Crop to just the QR code and account info area, removing the footer copyright text and extra whitespace, keeping the PhonePe logo header, 'ACCEPTED HERE' label, QR code, and 'Mr Sandeep Kumar' name (AccountQRCodeFino Payments Bank - 4703_LIGHT_THEME.png > bharatsmm-phonepe-qr.dim_400x600.png)
